content: the cecilia collection features 5 patterns a cowl a scarf a hat mittens and socks it offers mix and match colourwork motifs for custom projects with floral geometric and figurative designs the designs were made in collaboration with yarn dyer bulbe bizarre with yarn gifted for the samples **yarn ** you will need at least three colours of fingering weight yarn with the following amounts brim 85 95 / 105 / 120 m 93 104 / 115 / 131 yds colourwork total mc 95 105 / 125 / 150 m 104 115 / 137 / 164 yds colourwork total cc 85 90 / 105 / 135 m 93 98 / 115 / 148 yds use your mc or cc for the brim to work with only two colours simply add the amount required for the brim to the total of mc or cc you wish to use you can split these requirements to choose multiple colours both for mc and cc using leftovers or mini skeins for example the sample was knit with bulbe bizarre sock extrafine 400 m 437 yds / 100 g **needles ** main fabric 2 75 mm us 2 needles circular needles with appropriate cable length to knit in the round 40 cm 16 maximum or magic loop ribbing 2 25 mm us 1 needles circular needles with appropriate cable length to knit in the round 40 cm 16 maximum or magic loop or size required to get gauge **gauge ** 32 sts x 40 rounds = 10 cm / 4 using larger needles in stranded knitting after blocking note that a different gauge will affect size and yarn usage **sizes ** 1 2 / 3 / 4 finished circumference 45 50 / 55 / 60 cm 17 ¾ 19 ¾ / 21 ¾ / 23 ¾ finished height 23 cm 9 adjustable for a classic beanie fit pick a desired hat circumference that will give you up to 7 cm 2 ¾ negative ease for a looser fit pick a circumference closer to your actual measurement **notions ** stitch markers tapestry needle and scissors row counter recommended **techniques used ** folded brim in 2/2 ribbing crown shaped with simple decreases two colours stranded knitting in the round with few floats to catch pattern includes charted instructions charts contrast show a light background mc and dark patterns cc ------------------------------------------------------------------- la collection cecilia contient 5 patrons un tour de cou une écharpe un bonnet des mitaines et des chaussettes
